utilities.Utilities.name: Utilities
utilities.Utilities.doc: This service provides utilities for string encoding/decoding, date formatting, JSON manipulation, and other miscellaneous tasks.

method.name: base64Decode
method.doc: Decodes a base-64 encoded string into a UTF-8 byte array.

argument.name: encoded
argument.doc: an array of bytes of data to decode

method.name: base64Decode
method.doc: Decodes a base-64 encoded string into a byte array in a specific character set.

argument.name: encoded
argument.doc: the string of data to decode

argument.name: charset
argument.doc: a Charset specifying the charset of the input

method.name: base64DecodeWebSafe
method.doc: Decodes a base-64 web-safe encoded string into a UTF-8 byte array.

argument.name: encoded
argument.doc: an array of bytes of web-safe data to decode

method.name: base64DecodeWebSafe
method.doc: Decodes a base-64 web-safe encoded string into a byte array in a specific character set.

argument.name: encoded
argument.doc: the string of web-safe data to decode

argument.name: charset
argument.doc: a Charset specifying the charset of the input

method.name: base64Encode
method.doc: Generates a base-64 encoded string from the given byte array.

method.name: base64Encode
method.doc: Generates a base-64 encoded string from the given string.

argument.name: data
argument.doc: the string to encode

method.name: base64Encode
method.doc: Generates a base-64 encoded string from the given string in a specific character set.

argument.name: data
argument.doc: the string of data to encode

argument.name: charset
argument.doc: a Charset specifying the charset of the input

method.name: base64EncodeWebSafe
method.doc: Generates a base-64 web-safe encoded string from the given byte array.

method.name: base64EncodeWebSafe
method.doc: Generates a base-64 web-safe encoded string from the given string.

argument.name: data
argument.doc: the string to encode

method.name: base64EncodeWebSafe
method.doc: Generates a base-64 web-safe encoded string from the given string in a specific character set.

argument.name: data
argument.doc: the string of data to encode

argument.name: charset
argument.doc: a Charset specifying the charset of the input

method.name: computeDigest
method.doc: Compute a digest using the specified algorithm on the specified Byte[] value.

method.name: computeDigest
method.doc: Compute a digest using the specified algorithm on the specified String value.

argument.name: algorithm
argument.doc: a DigestAlgorithm to use

argument.name: value
argument.doc: an input string value to compute a digest for

method.name: computeDigest
method.doc: Compute a digest using the specified algorithm on the specified String value with the given character set.

argument.name: algorithm
argument.doc: a DigestAlgorithm to use

argument.name: value
argument.doc: an input string value to compute a digest for

argument.name: charset
argument.doc: a Charset representing the input character set

method.name: computeHmacSha256Signature
method.doc: Signs the provided value using HMAC-SHA256 with the given key.

method.name: computeHmacSha256Signature
method.doc: Signs the provided value using HMAC-SHA256 with the given key.

argument.name: value
argument.doc: the input value to generate a hash for

argument.name: key
argument.doc: a key to use to generate the hash with

method.name: computeHmacSha256Signature
method.doc: Signs the provided value using HMAC-SHA256 with the given key and character set.

argument.name: value
argument.doc: the input value to generate a hash for

argument.name: key
argument.doc: a key to use to generate the hash with

argument.name: charset
argument.doc: a Charset representing the input character set

method.name: computeHmacSignature
method.doc: Compute a message authentication code using the specified algorithm on the specified key and value.

method.name: computeHmacSignature
method.doc: Compute a message authentication code using the specified algorithm on the specified key and value.

argument.name: algorithm
argument.doc: a MacAlgorithm algorithm to use to hash the input value

argument.name: value
argument.doc: the input value to generate a hash for

argument.name: key
argument.doc: a key to use to generate the hash with

method.name: computeHmacSignature
method.doc: Compute a message authentication code using the specified algorithm on the specified key and value.

argument.name: algorithm
argument.doc: a MacAlgorithm algorithm to use to hash the input value

argument.name: value
argument.doc: the input value to generate a hash for

argument.name: key
argument.doc: a key to use to generate the hash with

argument.name: charset
argument.doc: a Charset representing the input character set

method.name: computeRsaSha256Signature
method.doc: Signs the provided value using RSA-SHA256 with the given key.

argument.name: value
argument.doc: the input value to generate a hash for

argument.name: key
argument.doc: a PEM formatted key to use to generate the signature

method.name: computeRsaSha256Signature
method.doc: Signs the provided value using RSA-SHA256 with the given key.

argument.name: value
argument.doc: the input value to generate a hash for

argument.name: key
argument.doc: a PEM formatted key to use to generate the signature

argument.name: charset
argument.doc: a Charset representing the input character set

method.name: formatDate
method.doc: Formats date according to specification described in Java SE SimpleDateFormat class.

argument.name: date
argument.doc: a Date to format as a String

argument.name: timeZone
argument.doc: the output timezone of the result

argument.name: format
argument.doc: a format per the SimpleDateFormat specification

method.name: formatString
method.doc: Performs sprintf-like string formatting using '%'-style format strings.

argument.name: template
argument.doc: The format string that controls what gets returned.

argument.name: args
argument.doc: Objects to use to fill in the '%' placeholders in the template.

method.name: getUuid
method.doc: Get a UUID as a string (equivalent to using the java.util.UUID.randomUUID() method).

method.name: gzip
method.doc: gzip-compresses the provided Blob data and returns it in a new Blob object.

argument.name: blob
argument.doc: a Blob object to compress using gzip.

method.name: gzip
method.doc: gzip-compresses the provided Blob data and returns it in a new Blob object.

argument.name: blob
argument.doc: a Blob object to compress using gzip.

argument.name: name
argument.doc: the name of the gzip file to be created

method.name: newBlob
method.doc: Create a new Blob object from a byte array.

method.name: newBlob
method.doc: Create a new Blob object from a byte array and content type.

method.name: newBlob
method.doc: Create a new Blob object from a byte array, content type, and name.

method.name: newBlob
method.doc: Create a new Blob object from a string.

argument.name: data
argument.doc: the string for the blob, assumed UTF-8

method.name: newBlob
method.doc: Create a new Blob object from a string and content type.

argument.name: data
argument.doc: the string for the blob, assumed UTF-8

argument.name: contentType
argument.doc: the content type of the blob - can be null

method.name: newBlob
method.doc: Create a new Blob object from a string, content type, and name.

argument.name: data
argument.doc: the string for the blob, assumed UTF-8

argument.name: contentType
argument.doc: the content type of the blob - can be null

argument.name: name
argument.doc: the name of the blob - can be null

method.name: parseCsv
method.doc: Returns a tabular 2D array representation of a CSV string.

argument.name: csv
argument.doc: a string containing a single or multiline data in comma-separated value (CSV) format

method.name: parseCsv
method.doc: Returns a tabular 2D array representation of a CSV string using a custom delimiter.

argument.name: csv
argument.doc: a string containing a single or multiline data in comma-separated value (CSV) format

argument.name: delimiter
argument.doc: between values

method.name: sleep
method.doc: Sleeps for specified number of milliseconds.

argument.name: milliseconds
argument.doc: The number of milliseconds to sleep.

method.name: ungzip
method.doc: Uncompresses a Blob object and returns a Blob containing the uncompressed data.

argument.name: blob
argument.doc: the Blob of compressed data.

method.name: unzip
method.doc: Takes a Blob representing a zip file and returns its component files.

argument.name: blob
argument.doc: the zip file blob.

method.name: zip
method.doc: Creates a new Blob object that is a zip file containing the data from the Blobs passed in.

argument.name: blobs
argument.doc: a array of blobs to zip up

method.name: zip
method.doc: Creates a new Blob object that is a zip file containing the data from the Blobs passed in.

argument.name: blobs
argument.doc: a array of blobs to zip up

argument.name: name
argument.doc: the name of the zip file to be created

utilities.Charset.name: Charset
utilities.Charset.doc: A typesafe enum for character sets.
